title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 103.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 103.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Articles 48-B and 48-C of the Vehicle and Traffic Law
provide for the registration of all-terrain vehicles (ATV's) and establish
rules concerning the use and operation of ATV's on both public and private
lands. These regulations are intended to implement the provisions of those
articles where necessary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
103.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
